alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:41AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cameron, west central Lafayette, southeastern Jefferson Davis, southern Acadia and western Vermilion Parishes through 615 AM CDT... At 541 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Jennings to 9 miles southeast of Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crowley, Jennings, Rayne, Kaplan, Lake Arthur, Gueydan, Mermentau, Rockefeller Wildlife Range, Pecan Island, Klondike, Forked Island, Evangeline, Duson, Morse, Riceville, Wright, Indian Bayou, Egan, Lowry and Lyons Point. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 64 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Lake Charles.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lafayette; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
